77-115.County assessor, defined.

County assessor includes an elected or appointed county assessor or a county clerk who is an ex officio county assessor.

SourceLaws 1987, LB 508, § 2;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 41;Laws 2000, LB 968, § 24;Laws 2003, LB 292, § 5;Laws 2008, LB965, § 2;Laws 2015, LB261, § 5.

Cross ReferencesCounty clerk acting as ex officio county assessor, see section 23-3203.
